articles.title: Gold Prices Gain In India By A Margin Even As Global Rates Dip; Platinum Hits 6-Yr High Price - Goodreturns
articles.description: Gold prices in India gained by a margin even though there was seen a dip in international gold rates. On the MCX, at around 11:40 am, gold futures for April delivery traded higher by Rs. 97 or 0.2 percent to Rs. 47,415 per 10 gm.
